rules_text:
Discipline [i](This creature gains abilities from its types. Whenever it enters or you put a counter on it, it gains your choice of these types.)[/i]
[b]Rogue[/b] | Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
[b]Wizard[/b] | You may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast noncreature spells. They can't be countered.
